headline: Truist Lowers PT on Mastercard Incorporated (MA) from $640 to $612; Maintains ‘Buy’ Rating
summary: Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) secures a place on our list of the 12 Best Ethical Companies to Invest in 2025. Ahead of its Q2 earnings, Truist decreased its price target on Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) from $640 to $612, maintaining a ‘Buy’ rating, reflecting its continued confidence in the stock. While the Fintech sector has lagged behind […]
